abstractText: A badly damaged leaf, with the left side almost entirely torn off and the remaining portion badly scratched and faded, with a few readable words, including the invocations "namo vairocanaṃ jinaṃ" and, below, "namo akṣobhyatathāgataṃ", which point to a Buddhist Mahāyāna text.
abstractShort: A badly damaged leaf, with the left side almost entirely torn off and the remaining portion badly scratched and faded, with
title: Unidentified Mahāyāna fragment
